column4: is it normal that Xubuntu runs slower than XP on my AMD 550 mhz ?
Is Xubuntu supposed to be slwer than XP?
no, how much mem do you have?
more than enough for Xubuntu, im using a crappy 700 Mhz lappy with that much mem
if you run top in Terminal, any processes that are significatly taking CPU time?
open the Terminal, type top, Enter, what processes are taking up most CPU/mem?
the process name, and what value?
though it sounds like Xorg to me
if you shut down gaim, any better?
LiveCD theres a few steps, i use Super GRUB CD
have you done integrity check on the CD?
perhaps you should check the MD5 of the ISO, and perhaps reburn
is it the old /bin/sh tty job control issue? probably boot with all_generic_ide in that case, otherwise
you could try the alternate issue
